name: TOYOTA CROWN ATHLETE 3.0L (GRS184)
description: The 2006 Toyota Crown Athlete is a premium, sport-oriented luxury sedan from Toyota's long-running Crown lineup, popular in Japan and often imported to other markets. This particular unit is the desirable Athlete trim, which has a more dynamic character than the standard Royal Saloon models. This vehicle is brand new and has never been used.
features: Engine: 3.0L V6 (3GR-FSE) with Direct Injection – smooth, powerful, and responsive (approximately 256 hp)
Drivetrain: Rear-Wheel Drive (RWD) – true driver's car feel, excellent handling for a big sedan
Factory Alloy Wheels – 18-inch Athlete-specific sporty design
Steering Wheel Audio/Cruise Controls (both left and right sides) – Full steering switch controls
